I had to have this since it combines two of my favorite things - Bats and crochet! I could have made something similar myself but I love the bats on it! It will match perfectly with the Jack and Sally themed outfit I made myself that I wear every Halloween. Although, it is so cute I plan on using it every chance I get!

I love crochet accessories and everything spooky, so I was over the moon when I discovered this bandana was a thing. And it doesn't disappoint! It looks just like the product photos and is really well made. I'm obsessed with the creativity of the design, and the detailing of the knit is beautiful. The yarn isn't the softest, but it's not the roughest either, and the bandana as a whole is very pliable and easy to work with. Overall, I'm obsessed! I can't wait to wear it with my skeleton cardigan this spooky season. Highly recommend!
